text: Here u go, thanks for your help :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi, I was going through the API Documentation for generating access tokens. When i followed the same the API responds with 415 Error Unsupported Content Type.

Hello, i'm looking for a tutorial to integrate tracking in my web app (Nodejs & Express + Vue.js) to identify contact on login with my own login system, is there any ? I can't find anything on the internet

Hello folks,

*I need your help in HubSpot contact update API V3.*
In previous version, there was an API endpoint to find contact by unique email id and can update it as well. But when I'm trying the same in V3 it stats that to update contact we'll need contact id compulsory.
What is the solution in this case, I'm not having contact Id on my website I just have access of user's email id. Please help me for that.
Having the same issue as Milan, is there any solution to this?

> The `idProperty` query parameter doesn't appear on the _Endpoints_ tab due to technical limitations, but it can be used for contacts exclusively with `email`. To use an email address as the unique identifier, set the `idProperty` as `email` and enter the email address in place of the contact ID. This should be set as a query parameter rather than added to the request body.
Okay this is what I need exactly. I was playing around by changing query parameters for the API but was not working. But this API link seems to be helpful. Let me try it.
<@UD53A9UUR> That works perfectly. Thanks a lot man :raised_hands:
I've read through and I'm not sure if this is applicable to my use case. I am looking to push custom modules into multiple of my clients' HubSpot accounts, not my own HubSpot account.

I haven’t personally built that out before, but the first thing I’d look at is using <https://docs.github.com/en/actions/using-jobs/using-a-matrix-for-your-jobs|matrix> to add multiple portal IDs & access keys to deal with the various portals.
there is no information in my HubSpot API key call log that could help to explain this
Is there a way I can see which 3rd party apps have been authorized on top of my CRM? Can I get when they were authorized?

Am I missing something. Can the new “Private App” access the Timeline Events? I’m getting the following error:
`does not have proper permissions! (requires all of [developers-read])`
